body: Daniel Arellano [es] writes about Chile's "Green Revolution": Environmental activists and concerned citizens are trying to raise awareness about 5 coal mining projects and the effects they would have on Isla Riesco, an island in the southernmost region of Chile.
original_body: Daniel Arellano [es] writes about Chile's "Green Revolution": Environmental activists and concerned citizens are trying to raise awareness about 5 coal mining projects and the effects they would have on Isla Riesco, an island in the southernmost region of Chile.
title: Chile's "Green Revolution": Fighting Coal Mining in Isla Riesco
